property.caption: Element ID
property.description: This ID of the HTML element to turn into a circle

property.caption: Value
property.description: Init value of the circle (optional, defaults to 0)

property.caption: Max Value
property.description: Maximum value of the circle (optional, defaults to 100)

property.caption: Width
property.description: The width of the ring (optional, has value 10, if not specified)

property.caption: Colours
property.description: An array of colors, with the first item coloring the full circle (optional, it will be ['#EEE', '#F00'] if not specified) Can also be an rgba() value (example: ['rgba(255,255,255,0.25)', 'rgba(125,125,125,0.5)'])

property.caption: Duration
property.description: Value in ms of animation's duration; defaults to 500; if 0 or null is passed, the animation will not run.

property.caption: Wrapper Class
property.description: class name to apply on the generated element wrapping the whole circle.

property.caption: Text Class
property.description: Class name to apply on the generated element wrapping the text content.

property.caption: Value Stroke Class
property.description: Class name to apply on the SVG path element which for the value amount.

property.caption: Max Value Stroke Class
property.description: Class name to apply on the SVG path element which for the maxValue amount.

property.caption: Style Text
property.description: Whether or not to add inline styles to the text (defaults to true).
